text: Carlos de Almeida (born 11 December 1969) is a Brazilian rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1991 Pan American Games Category:Rowers at the 1995 Pan American Games
title: Carlos de Almeida
